page.title: 07 MILL ON THE BRUE BRUTON-ONE
page.content: Mill on the Brue is an activity holiday camp at Gants Mill farm, Bruton,Somerset.It is for children who are 8 to 14 years old,who stay for a week.The activities that different people can do are: Grass sking,rafting,milking a cow, archery,caving,canoe games,feeding animals,shooting,golf,B.M.Xing,going on the assault course and they have a barbecue night. An example of a day at the camp. 8:00am breakfast 9:00am animal feeding 10:00am canoeing 12:30pm lunch 2:00pm death slide and assault course 4:30pm archery 7:30pm volleyball,hockey,badger watching. This is only one day at the site.
